personas.label: Tough
personas.description: Challenging questions with high standards and detailed follow-ups
personas.characteristics: Direct, demanding, detail-oriented, pushes for specifics
personas.questionStyle: Deep technical probing, edge cases, performance under pressure

personas.label: Relaxed
personas.description: Comfortable conversation style with encouraging atmosphere
personas.characteristics: Friendly, supportive, patient, allows thinking time
personas.questionStyle: Conversational approach, collaborative discussion, stress-free environment

personas.label: Serious
personas.description: Professional and focused approach with structured questioning
personas.questionStyle: Structured interview format, precise questions, formal assessment

personas.label: Calm
personas.description: Steady and composed interviewing style with thoughtful pace
personas.characteristics: Even-tempered, patient, reflective, gives space to think
personas.questionStyle: Measured questioning, allows pauses, thoughtful follow-ups
